name: My Mother, The Car Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is Buster trying to avoid in the beginning of this episode?
questions.explanation:
Lucille Austero.

	After accidentally flirting with her at an awards show, accidentally bidding ten thousand dollars on her at a charity auction and entering her apartment by mistake, Buster is in constant fear that he will have to encounter Lucille again.

questions.text: What is Michael trying to sell?
questions.explanation:
The family yacht.

	Lucille (Bluth) doesn't want Michael to sell the yacht because she wants to hold an extravagant party to upstage Lucille Austero for her birthday.  She says that Michael is her third least favourite child in the family.

questions.text: What is the name of the preview during the movie that Maeby and George Michael went to see at the theatre (in English)?
questions.explanation:
Dangerous Cousins.

	George Michael decided that he wanted to get rid of his crush on his cousin Maeby, but the situation got worse after they saw a sexy romance movie preview called "Dangerous Cousins".  This movie will reappear in later episodes.

questions.text: During the first attempt to throw Lucille a birthday party, where was Lindsay?
questions.explanation:
Out shopping.

	After visiting prison for the first time, Lindsey was shocked to see that none of the prisoners were even looking at her, so she decided to go shopping and visit the next day.  Michael was the only one to show up for Lucille's party because he drove her to the restaurant.

questions.text: Did anyone new arrive at the second attempt at throwing a surprise party?
questions.explanation:
No.

	After planning a whole new party, the same thing happened, and Lucille was once again devastated.  Buster was going to go, but he decided to be with Lucille Austero instead.

questions.text: Michael crashes the car on the way back from the second party.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Michael decides to let Lucille drive the car although she's a horrible driver, and she decides to try and scare a person on a motorized scooter.  She ends up crashing the car and making it seem like Michael did it.

questions.text: Why does Buster need bandages around his head?
options: He was in a car crash
He hit his head on a rock
He bumped it on a wall
questions.explanation:
He jumped through a window.

	After seeing his mother outside her apartment, Buster jumps through Lucille Austero's window to prevent her from seeing the two of them together.  Lucille Austero calls the doctor who is just finishing up with Michael's inspection.

questions.text: Who does George Michael go to for fake IDs?
questions.explanation:
Gob.

	After being kicked out of the theatre during the preview for "Dangerous Cousins", he decides that he wants to get fake IDs for himself and Maeby.  Gob decides to take the yacht to South America while Michael is stuck in Lucille's apartment.

questions.text: How did Lucille send George Sr. the gold for the prison?
options: She had Gob send them in
questions.explanation:
In energy bar wrappers.

	After assuming that Lucille was frail in the beginning of the episode, Michael finds out that there was gold in the energy bar wrappers that she was struggling to carry.  George Sr. used the gold to pay off the other inmates to protect Lindsay from harassment.

questions.text: Does Tobias appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Tobias appears in the next episode called "In God We Trust", but he doesn't appear in this episode.  Everyone else in the cast appears in this episode.
